text: Mirosław Mruk (born 11 February 1962) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Poznań County
title: Mirosław Mruk
